keys: Ciencia SESE. Fuerzas de energía. Plan de lección

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4386</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Kaleidoscope Activities</string>
            <string language="es">Actividades con kaleidoscopio</string>
            <string language="ga">Gníomhaíochtaí Kaleidoscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kaleidoskop-Aktivitäten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activités de kaléidoscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividades De Kaleidoscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività Di Kaleidoscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δραστηριότητες καλειδοσκόπιων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Instructions and notes concerning activities involving kaleidoscopes. Beautiful, symmetrical patterns can be seen by causing multiple reflections to be formed.</string>
            <string language="es">Instrucciones y notas relativas a actividades con kaleidoscopios. Se pueden ver bonitas estructuras simétricas que forman múltiples reflejos.</string>
            <string language="ga">Treoracha agus nótaí do ghníomhaíochtaí a bhaineann le kaleidoscope. Is féidir pátrúin áille, siméadracha a fheiceáil trí go leor frithchaithimh a chur i ngnímh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencia SESE. Fuerzas de energía. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">EnergyForces</string>
            <string language="ga">EnergyForces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisungen und Anmerkungen hinsichtlich sind der 
Aktivitäten, die Kaleidoskope mit einbeziehen. Schöne, 
symmetrische Muster können gesehen werden, indem man mehrfache 
Reflexionen veranläßt gebildet zu werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Instructions et notes au sujet des activités 
impliquant des kaléidoscopes. De belles, symétriques 
configurations peuvent être vues en causant des réflexions multiples
d'être formées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instruções e notas a respeito das atividades que
envolvem kaleidoscopes. Os testes padrões bonitos, simétricos 
podem ser vistos fazendo com que as reflexões múltiplas sejam dadas 
forma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Istruzioni e note riguardo alle attività che 
coinvolgono i kaleidoscopes. I modelli bei e simmetrici possono 
essere visti inducendo le riflessioni multiple ad essere formato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδηγίες και σημειώσεις σχετικά με τις δραστηριότητες 
που περιλαμβάνουν τα καλειδοσκόπια. Τα όμορφα, συμμετρικά 
πρότυπα μπορούν να δουν με να αναγκάσουν τις 
πολλαπλάσιες αντανακλάσεις για να διαμορφωθούν.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">EnergyForces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">EnergyForces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">EnergyForces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
